# JDownRight
<!--
@name: JDownRight
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Test for joystick movement down and right
## Parameters

- **joystick**: The number of the joystick
- **lock**: If true, the function will wait for the button to be released before being true again
---
